ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I sometimes have a hard time not getting stuff. I ll be running around and people will offer me stuff. Or I ll stop to tell someone their shield looks cool or
ygData.messageBody:
I sometimes have a hard time not getting stuff. I'll be running around and
people will offer me stuff. Or I'll stop to tell someone their shield looks
cool or that I think their name is cool (not trying to get anything, just
being friendly). Or I help people find stuff and I chat with people.
Sometimes people give me stuff just for making them laugh. There was another
player who was trying to figure out how to get money. I told her "just be
friendly. Talk to people. But don't do it for money. Just try to have fun.".
Later she told me that she tried that and someone gave her 60pp.
luv,
-Su

> ROFLMBO!!!! I don't go around inspecting anyone. This level 6 inspected
me
> and then told me to inspect him. I don't pay attention to others. I
guess
> this person wanted to show me what his rich uncle gave him. I don't know
any
> 16 year olds driving a BMW. I live in the country. You don't see many
BMWs
> out here. I'm not in for a sad EQ life. I enjoy it very much thank you.
> I'm not in it for an uber character. I play to have fun. I am not
> anti-twinkage. My husband has a couple high characters on another
account.
> So I could twink my enchanter out outrageously. I choose to do it wisely.
>
> Lena
>
>
> > If you go around inspecting lower level players, you are going to find A
LOT
> > of people with great gear better than yours. I guess you're in for a sad
EQ
> > life, or atleast until you understand this and get over your sadness or
you
> > obtain some great gear for yourself.
> >
> > Buy low, sell high and go buy your own uber gear.
>
>
>
